Fiber Elephant has the following promotions:

We offer fully-managed Virtuozzo VPS on the SoftLayer network, have a team of 5 in the US and Europe, & NEVER OVERSELL! Unlike many(if not all) other VPS providers, we guarantee CPU allocations rather than "equal share" which means that although you'll have the ability to burst on our Quad Xeon CPUs, you'll never have less than specified CPU allocations.


Our standard(fully customizable) plans are as follows:
